OOC: No. Once the Predacons arrived Scorponok jumped out to the surface and transformed to robot mode with Zarak becoming the head. Woot for me being the first to bring a Headmaster into NBW... I think.

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                                  OOC: Before I reply, Rick, can you tell me where Scorponok was last
 time he appeared? Was he still underground?
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "khamkain" <khamkain@...> wrote:
 >
 > ooc: Hi guys, finally back to normal (YAY!) 
 > 
 > bic: 
 > Remus: I'll take to crazy bot, just need is last location!
 > 
 > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <warriorazure@> wrote:
 > >
 > > Deadfur turned to Remus: What's going on? It's a frickin' attack, what
 > > else? We've got us a furious bot down there, trying to blow us up for
 > > some reason, and more Preds coming in. Small number of those, mind
 > > you, but I know Jotunn's not a fool. This means something bad, but I
 > > don't know what. So, Remus, pick your target and go!
 > > 
 > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <warriorazure@> wrote:
 > > >
 > > > ooc: Hi everyone i'm (kham) using my brother's acount unitl some
 > > > technical problem are fixed.
 > > > 
 > > > bic: While Remus was in the CR chamber, he tought about his
 coming to
 > > > this planet:to earth. The on thing he couldn`t explain was his
 > > > survival from a crash without any protection other than is own
 body...
 > > >     on top of that he have no memory of anything that happen before.
 > > > Where do he come from? why? Do he have any mission here? 
 > > > 
 > > > Has he was thinking, the sound of an attack cut the flow of is
 tough.
 > > > Eager to go help Deadfur, Remus rushed out of the Building as
 soon as
 > > > the CR bipped.
 > > > 
 > > > Running toward Deadfur he yelled : DEADFUR! WHAT THE HELL IS
 GOING ON
 > > > HERE?
 > > > 
 > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
 > > > >
 > > > > ::Scorponok/Zarak::
 > > > > 
 > > > > Scorponok is moving about trying to avoid as much damage as
 possible
 > > > but was taking shots from the fliers. To protect himself Scorponok
 > > > burows into the ground somewhat and shoots another fusion blast
 at the
 > > > city along with the two rockets he fired.(My last post with him.
 They
 > > > should still be in flight.)
 > > > > 
 > > > > Scorponok completely burows underground to avoid the "rock drop"
 > > > bombs. The ground is being ripped up above him.
 > > > > 
 > > > > Zarak has now crawled into a cockpit like part on Scorponok.
 > > > > 
 > > > > Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:                                 
 > > > Deadfur: Just great... How about a Minion attack while everyone
 else's
 > > > >  at it?
 > > > >  
 > > > >  He opened the Maximal only frenquency.
 > > > >  
 > > > >  Deadfur: Troops, this is Deadfur speaking. We have a report of
 > > another
 > > > >  wave of Preds coming in. We have to get rid of that giant bug
 > before
 > > > >  they get here, unless some of you can manage to turn him the
 > > other way
 > > > >  around. For now, continue with hit-and-run. Try to sneak up on
 > > him and
 > > > >  to plant some bombs there. Engineering, how's the shield
 comin' up?
 > > > >  
 > > > >  Officer: Slowly, commander. We don't have the city covered yet,
 > > but we
 > > > >  do have defenses over the gravitaion nullifiers. It will take
 a lot
 > > > >  before they shoot us down from the skies.
 > > > >  
 > > > >  Deafur: Good, keep working on it. Keep up the efforts, soldiers!
 > > > >  
 > > > >  The small fliers were buzzing quickly around Skorponok,
 > strafing him
 > > > >  with lasers and missiles, while higher up, a team was trying a
 > "rock
 > > > >  drop" technique. They were miles high above the Decepticon and
 > > > >  dropping small but heavy bombs that would generate a bigger
 impact
 > > > >  because of the altitude...
 > > > >  
 > > > >  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@>
 wrote:
 > > > >  >
 > > > >  > ::Lord Elder::
 > > > >  > 
 > > > >  > Elder thinks over this change in events before opening a return
 > > > >  channel to Deadfur.
 > > > >  > 
 > > > >  > Elder: You're not going to like it. I'm showing what appears to
 > > be a
 > > > >  whole squadren of fliers and probably more coming your way.
 > Since you
 > > > >  are on site and assisting the Maximals I'm scrapping the 'no
 > > > >  interference' order. I'm on my way and I'll try and get as much
 > back
 > > > >  up as possible.
 > > > >  > 
 > > > >  > Elder switches to an open Watcher channel.
 > > > >  > 
 > > > >  > Elder: Watchers, this is Lord Elder. One of our ranks is
 > directing
 > > > >  the defense of the Maximal City Relay. They are faced with a
 > > > >  Decepticon attack and a coming Predacon assualt. They are to
 > recieve
 > > > >  are full aid. I'm going there myself. Elder out.
 > > > >  > 
 > > > >  > He closes communications and heads for the exit. Only
 > Watchers know
 > > > >  how to survive the harsh lands around their base. Avoid them.
 > > > >  > 
 > > > >  > Elder leaves Cryonosis in a small shuttle pod that will get
 > him to
 > > > >  the main land.
 > > > >  > 
 > > > >  > Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:                                 
 > > > >  Deadfur got the message on the Watchers-only frequency. He was
 > > not too
 > > > >  >  pleased with the news. As soon as he could, he opened a line
 > with
 > > > >  >  Cryonosis.
 > > > >  >  
 > > > >  >  Deadfur: Deadfur reporting. I'm assisting the Maxies in Relay
 > > as per
 > > > >  >  emergency protocols and I'm directing the defenses against
 that
 > > > brute.
 > > > >  >  I require further instructions and backups, my Lord. Oh, and
 > > > just how
 > > > >  >  large is that coming Pred force?
 > > > >  >  
 > > > >  >  He ducked as something blew up nearby.
 > > > >  >  
 > > > >  >  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@>
 > wrote:
 > > > >  >  >
 > > > >  >  > ::Lord Elder::
 > > > >  >  > 
 > > > >  >  > Deep within The Watcher headquarters signals go off,
 > waking the
 > > > >  >  Watcher leader.
 > > > >  >  > 
 > > > >  >  > Elder: What in the hell?
 > > > >  >  > 
 > > > >  >  > He checks the monitoring systems that The Watchers have
 set up
 > > > >  >  around the planet.
 > > > >  >  > 
 > > > >  >  > Elder: One of the Predacon camps looks like their
 > mobalizing to
 > > > >  >  attack Relay. Wonderful. Sometimes I think The Minions are
 > > easier to
 > > > >  >  deal... What's this?
 > > > >  >  > 
 > > > >  >  > Elder locks onto a new signature.
 > > > >  >  > 
 > > > >  >  > Elder: It's Decepticon, but not a normal Con signal.
 Something
 > > > new.
 > > > >  >  Something different.
 > > > >  >  > 
 > > > >  >  > He opens a comm to his men.
 > > > >  >  > 
 > > > >  >  > Elder: Watchers: I believe a new twist in these Beast
 Wars has
 > > > >  >  happened. I want Watchers at Relay ASAP. Do not get involved
 > > > unless I
 > > > >  >  order it but I want to study the battle there. Right now the
 > > Silver
 > > > >  >  Wing Maximals are dealing with some kind of new Decepticon
 > but it
 > > > >  >  appears that Predacons are moving to attack as well. Elder
 out.
 > > > >  >  >
